body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, welcome to Car Deals Direct. My name is Edward Washington. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Frances. Can you confirm your phone number for our records?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's five five five, two three four, nine zero one zero.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you. And what is the postal code of your current location?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: My postal code is M four C two L three.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thank you for providing that information. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, I'm feeling confused about the shipping process.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand, Frances. Let me clarify that for you. Thank you for reaching out and sharing your concerns. We appreciate your time.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Have a wonderful day, Frances. Goodbye.
